scripts.build: npm i -g bun && bun i && antlr4ng -o ./lib -Dlanguage=JavaScript -visitor -listener *.g4 && babel ./lib --out-dir ./lib --plugins=@babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs && esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --outfile=fplus
scripts.pkg: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && pkg --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-arm64,node18-win-arm64,node18-macos-arm64 --compress GZip --out-path ./dist fplus && cd ./dist && zip -r dist.zip * && cd .. && mv ./dist/dist.zip ./dist.zip && rm -rf ./dist fplus-*.zip
scripts.publish: git tag -a "$TAG" -m "Release $TAG" && mv ./dist.zip "./fplus-${TAG}.zip" && gh release create "$TAG" --title "Release $TAG" --notes "" -R https://github.com/FreshPenguin112/fplus fplus-"$TAG".zip && rm -rf fplus-*.zip && rm -rf fplus-*.zip
